texts.name: Caballero
texts.biography: Caballero is a gnoll and he used to be a guard who belonged to King Tarossik. Since a failure assassination he was banished to a board village, in this place he experienced invasion of undead and suffered from plague and disaster. Now he becomes a member of church and starts a new life.
